text: However, the 8900 aka Curve II aka Javelin will not be hitting store shelves on the 11th or 18th according to the press release. T-Mobile is being coy and saying it's coming sometime this month. It could happen on those dates, but T-Mobile is n't confirming anything today. No word on price either. 1Official specs after the jump:
title: Rumors have been floating for weeks now and we knew the 8900 would be coming sometime in early '09 and tonight T-Mobile has made it official.
